title: Flower Pow
summaries: The Flower Pow is a Hardmode, post-Plantera flail which, in addition to the usual flail mechanics, has the unique ability to rapidly fire pink flower petals at nearby enemies. Petal projectiles deal 66.67% of the weapon's base damage (86 damage) and inflict half of its knockback (base knockback of 3.25 (Weak)). While the âš’ Use / Attack button is held, the Flower Pow's head launches petals at a steady rate at nearby enemies within its line of sight. The fire rate increases drastically when the flail's head is released and remains at rest on solid blocks. The Flower Pow has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance of being dropped by Plantera.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
